column1: CALL apoc.uuid.install(label, {addToExistingNodes: true/false, uuidProperty: 'uuid'}) yield label, installed, properties, batchComputationResult \
column2: it will add the uuid transaction handler

column1: for the provided `label` and `uuidProperty`, in case the UUID handler is already present it will be replaced by the new one
CALL apoc.uuid.list() yield label, installed, properties \
column2: provides a list of all the uuid handlers installed with the related configuration

column1: CALL apoc.uuid.remove(label) yield label, installed, properties \
column2: remove previously added uuid handler and returns uuid information. All the existing uuid properties are left as-is

column1: CALL apoc.uuid.removeAll() yield label, installed, properties \
column2: it removes all previously added uuid handlers and returns uuids information. All the existing uuid properties are left as-is
